decision_conditions: No details have been submitted for the proposed aluminium cladding and capping. Officers are unable to assess whether the materials would be suitable for the development which is located within Riverside South Conservation Area. As such insufficient information has been submitted to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
